thread.title: Hero who chased driver in underwear wants to help youth | Daily Mail Online
thread.title_full: Hero who chased driver in underwear wants to help youth | Daily Mail Online

author: Belinda Grant Geary
title: Hero who chased driver in underwear wants to help youth | Daily Mail Online
text: Toothless hero who chased down a runaway driver in his underwear reveals he's trying to use his stardom to help at-risk youths - but refused an offer to fix his teeth for free Daniel McConnell was branded 'Australian of the year' in a TV broadcast He chased an unlicensed driver who fell asleep and collided with a shop The father-of-four led police to the driver while only wearing underpants Months afterwards, he says he wants to use his fame to help at-risk youth But the hero revealed he turned down an offer to have his teeth fixed for free Published: 04:49 GMT, 18 February 2017 | Updated: 04:49 GMT, 18 February 2017 489 shares
